welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cartersville, the charming city known for its rich history and scenic beauty. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richard B Russell Airport serves all commercial flights and includes various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Richard B Russell Airport serves private and charter flights, with a separate entrance and parking area.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
